Text:
I would like to get it if possible, but don't put yourself out.
If you can't continue then I would like to thank you for all the episodes you have posted.
thank you RossPat,... this was just a hobby but now it is a chore , its people like you that keep me posting,I will be leaving on the first on vacation and back on the tenth,thanks and its been fun.

Dear Mr2Wingz - enjoy ur holiday. I'm sorry to hear this is a chore to you...I've always wondered what the driving force was behind the uploaders since I've never uploaded anything due to such a limited bandwidth. Anyhow, whatever you upload whenever is truly appreciated by your core followers.
Mr2wingz:  Cheers man.  Have a great trip & enjoy!
@mr2wingz, thanks for all the JJ you've given us. I hope you have an awesome trip!
Thanks for everything mr2wingz. You are the only uploader that I know by name, thanks to your JJ releases. Tou are the man :)

Nice of u people we dont thank the people enough that upload things and put it here so we can enjoy.And thanks again mr2wingz *_* vacation ? In Brazil? thats where i am at,if u come this way let me know *_*.
I hope  you have a GREAT holiday Wingz, you sound like you could do with one. It is always appreciated what you do by giving people access to the Judge. :)
how can being awesome to people be a chore ? we love the judgejudy show please keep em coming...to make it less of a chore why not upload a whole weeks worth of episodes as 1 torrent ?
Your efforts are absolutely appreciated. Thank you for taking the time to post these.
